programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Rayna brings her kids and sister on tour, but doesn't like the effect Juliette is having on her girls; Juliette starts to look at Dante differently; Deacon reconsiders life on the road; a handsome new neighbor befriends Gunnar and Scarlett.

programme.sub-title: I'll Never Get Out of This World Alive

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Deacon awaits his pending jail sentence as Rayna is in a coma; Teddy grapples with Peggy's pregnancy; feeling alone, Maddie turns to Juliette; Gunnar's proposal complicates his relationship with Scarlett.

programme.desc: Rayna cancels the remainder of the tour; Teddy proposes to Peggy and tries to keep it a secret; Tandy discovers information about the death of Rayna's mother.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Scarlett struggles when Jeff Fordham wants his new artists to cultivate hot, sexy personas; Rayna wants to obtain the rights to her music; Avery and Gunnar decide to record songs with Scarlett's friend Zoey.

programme.desc: Rayna sets the record straight during an interview with Robin Roberts; Juliette runs into Charlie Wentworth; Scarlett turns to Avery for advice on the changes to her life.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Maddie feels lost as Teddy and Peggy's wedding day approaches; Juliette angers a lecherous but influential DJ; Deacon discovers an unexpected ally as he tries to find his way back to music.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Deacon confronts Rayna about putting too much pressure on Scarlett; Jeff battles Rayna for control of the album she made with Liam; Gunnar struggles as he attempts to write a song for a major artist.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: When Maddie wants to spend time with Deacon, Teddy starts to feel he's being replaced; Lamar asks Rayna to get Tandy to commit to being a character witness; Juliette worries about Layla's career stealing her spotlight.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Fan blowback against Juliette bring down her performance and the Music City Festival; Rayna wants to buy herself out of the Edgehill contract; Deacon and Gunnar decide to put on an unauthorized show.

programme.desc: Death changes lives forever as a mystery arises; Scarlett and Gunnar receive an offer from Kelly Clarkson; a video adversely affects Juliette's reputation; Rayna is under intense pressure to succeed.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Scarlett's career is on a hot streak as she performs with Zac Brown; Rayna asks Deacon for help writing a hit for her new album; Jeff is furious when concert venues keep dropping from Juliette's tour.

programme.sub-title: It's All Wrong, but It's All Right
programme.desc: Juliette decides not to apologize for her behavior during her Grand Ole Opry ceremony; Luke introduces Rayna to someone that could help with her distribution deal and surprises her with a NASCAR wrapped in Rayna Jaymes graphics.

programme.desc: While Rayna welcomes Lamar home from prison, Tandy remains aloof; Juliette avoids backlash as she hides out at Avery's; Scarlett is fueled by pills and creativity.

programme.sub-title: They Don't Make 'Em Like My Daddy Anymore
